data.name: Comcast
data.description: Comcast is a leading provider of internet services, offering fast and reliable connections with various plans to suit different needs. They also offer bundled services including TV and phone options.
data.emergency_steps:
- Check if there is a known service outage in your area by visiting the Xfinity Response Center.
- Restart your router by unplugging it, waiting 30 seconds, and plugging it back in.
- Use mobile data to access the internet for critical tasks if your home internet is down.
- Contact Xfinity support through their website or app for assistance with your internet service.
- Sign up for outage alerts through the Xfinity app to stay informed about service status.

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Consider signing up for the Xfinity 5-Year Price Guarantee to save on long-term costs with no annual contract xfinity.com.
- Use Xfinity's digital tools to easily transfer your service if you move to a new location xfinity.com.
